metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5817 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description:
A type confusion error within the "unpacked_load_raw()" function within LibRaw versions prior to 0.19.1 (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) can be exploited to trigger an infinite loop.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw20 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
rawtherapee package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
